toy_01.jpeg.expected_caption: A baby doll with curly blonde hair and a red jumpsuit sitting on a couch
toy_01.jpeg.notes: Realistic baby doll; neutral background makes it easy for detection

toy_02.jpeg.expected_caption: A fabric bunny doll wearing a striped outfit sitting on a coral chair
toy_02.jpeg.notes: Simple composition, muted lighting, small facial features

toy_03.jpeg.expected_caption: A white plush toy with yellow hair and a blue bow held in a hand
toy_03.jpeg.notes: Strong foreground-background contrast, face is round and minimalistic

toy_04.jpeg.expected_caption: A brown fabric dog toy wearing a pink hoodie
toy_04.jpeg.notes: Dog has pointed ears and visible facial contrast; dressed in clothing

toy_05.jpeg.expected_caption: A wooden toy kitchen with knobs, a pot, and toy food items
toy_05.jpeg.notes: Scene has context and many objects â€” good for complexity testing

toy_06.jpeg.expected_caption: A small fabric mouse doll in a pink dress lying on patterned bedding
toy_06.jpeg.notes: Subtle colors and textures; partially obscured toy

toy_07.jpeg.expected_caption: A colorful LEGO scene with animals, trees, and a house on a green baseplate
toy_07.jpeg.notes: High detail, many small objects and animal miniatures

toy_08.jpeg.expected_caption: A LEGO scene with a car, pool, and several small figures
toy_08.jpeg.notes: Multiple characters; action scene with toy interaction

toy_09.jpeg.expected_caption: A pile of stuffed animals and plush toys on a dark green blanket
toy_09.jpeg.notes: Group photo; objects overlapping and some partially visible

toy_10.jpeg.expected_caption: A miniature mouse toy in a bathroom with a tub, sink, and rug
toy_10.jpeg.notes: Indoor dollhouse scene, great for scene/context awareness testing

drawing_01.jpeg.expected_caption: A smiling creature with cat ears, striped fur, and purple cheeks
drawing_01.jpeg.notes: Simple style, bold outlines, cartoon-like, expressive face

drawing_02.jpeg.expected_caption: A fluffy grey bear with white ears standing on a blue background
drawing_02.jpeg.notes: Painted texture, more realistic, good lighting and contrast

drawing_03.jpeg.expected_caption: A green leaf with detailed veins lying on a white surface
drawing_03.jpeg.notes: Natural object, realistic drawing, clear structure

drawing_04.jpeg.expected_caption: A purple monster with big eyes, spots and horns standing in grass
drawing_04.jpeg.notes: Cartoon style, watercolor look, background details

drawing_05.jpeg.expected_caption: A bear with rainbow unicorn horn and round ears
drawing_05.jpeg.notes: Mixed fantasy elements, simplified shape, cute expression

drawing_06.jpeg.expected_caption: A girl with a crown and long hair standing next to a bird
drawing_06.jpeg.notes: Narrative scene, two characters, dress details, simple style
